page.title: 18Child's Life in the Claydons
page.content: {A day in the life of a 7 year old in {Steeple Claydon. Mornng: 0730 Get out of bed,wash and dress for school:-boys:grey trousers and jumper,blue shirt. girls:blue dresses and cardigan 0800 Eat breakfast of cereal and toast,(sometimes bacon and egg) and a cup of tea.Most children walk to school but some are brought by car.There are no children brought by coach to this school. 0900 School begins with 29 children in class. 1035 Playtime 1055 Schoolwork 1200 Lunch at school-meat and vegetables and fruit pudding. 1230 Play on school playground.See page 16 for some of the games the children play.
